item.title: AUSSIE, AUSSIE, AUSSIE! GOLF, GOLF, GOLF!
item.dc:creator: Skratch
item.description:
Australian golf is truly one-of-a-kind in the greatest way possible. Our resident Australian storyteller Zane Moulton captures a slice of the current state of the game during a recent trip home, via our main page. @walkergolfthings The intersection of golf and culture. Behind every drained putt or hosel rocket into the stands is a human being with complex emotions‚Äîamong them, an insatiable appetite for golf. That‚Äôs what we‚Äôre after. item.title: Rory Headlines an Australian Golf RESURGENCE
item.dc:creator: Skratch
item.description:
We golf in the land Down Under! Welcome to Golf Diaries, where Skratch takes you to amazing courses and happenings around the world of golf and beyond. On this edition, our Man at Work and resident Aussie, Zane Moulton, showcases Melbourne where he gets a great sense of the current golf culture around the iconic Australian Open, headlined this year by Grand Slam winner Rory McIlroy. The intersection of golf and culture. Behind every drained putt or hosel rocket into the stands is a human being
